name: CAN Bus AdBlue
desc: An e-commerce platform specializing in the online sale of accessories and equipment for heavy vehicles.

name: ThiebFood By Rama
desc: A food truck website offering authentic African cuisine in France, featuring dishes like Thiebou Diene and Thieb Poulet, made with fresh, high-quality ingredients.

name: Battery Health Analysis for Smart Cities
desc: A research and development project focused on analyzing the effects of bidirectional and inductive charging on battery health. The work emphasizes SOC and SOH parameters within a Smart City context, featuring Data Modeling, AWS Architecture, Fiware integration, AI applications, and 2D/3D design.

name: StoryGen
desc: Development of a SaaS platform for generating narrative videos using ChatGPT, DALLÂ·E, and APIs from Hugging Face.

name: Maritime Object Detection
desc: Real-time detection of maritime objects using YOLOv3 and YOLOv4 algorithms.

name: Solar System Application
desc: Development of a 3D interactive solar system using Three.js, HTML, JS, and CSS for desktop and Android.

name: Advanced QGIS Automation
desc: Implementation of advanced automation in QGIS using Python and PyQGIS for geospatial data processing.

name: DX7 Emulator with WebApp Control
desc: Real-time FM synthesis project using a DX7 Emulator, created with AppDesigner and controlled via a web application.

name: Smart Vehicle Protection System
desc: An innovative project developed during a Hackathon competition, focusing on vehicle protection systems using advanced technologies.
